name: Hoarder (snootyjerk)
description:
Hoarder is a game about risk and reward.   As a dragon, your life is dependent on your accumulated wealth.    As long as you've got cash, you can't truly die - but your giant pile of gold won't go unnoticed.

By bringing large amounts of gold back to your hoard, you get rewards: health recovery, boosted agility, and even stronger firepower.  Be careful, though - run out of hearts, and you'll be reborn at a high cost and lose some power-ups.

The townspeople won't take this laying down - not all of them, anyway.  Some will don armor and try to slay you, while others will risk it all to steal from your hoard.  If successful, Thieves will drain your wealth.  If your hoard runs dry, you'll die.

Be bold and destructive, but never leave your hoard unguarded for too long.

Comments and reviews are appreciated!  The game is far from finished, but I think it's still a good time.
